prompt: Build a simple task management app. I should be able to create, view, update, and delete tasks. Each task should have a title and a description. Keep the UI very basic.
I want a small app to track things I need to do daily.
Create an expense tracking app. Each expense should have an amount, category, date, and optional notes. I only need this for myself, no login or multi-user support.
Build a lightweight bug tracker for my personal projects. Each bug should have a title, severity, status, and description. I want to see all open bugs first.
Build a notes app where I can create, edit, and delete notes. Each note should have a title and content.
Build a backend-only API for managing tasks. I don't need any UI. I just want REST endpoints to create, update, list, and delete tasks.
Build a read-only dashboard that shows expenses by category. I don't want to create or edit data from the app — just view it.
Build a simple UI that lets me manually enter and view notes in the browser. I don't need any backend or APIs — the data can live only in the UI for now.
